title: Bella: The Ending
description: Protecting Bella had always been the plan and the only thing I ever wanted. Accepting her fathers offer to love and protect her was an honor. And I would honor that until the day I died. No matter the outcome of it all I’d never stop loving or protecting her.I’d begun this journey running for my life the night he saved me. I was scared and desperate for salvation. Now… he’s my world, the air I breath, the one and only person I’d ever allow to hold my soul in the palm of his protective hand.Love isn’t easy, but this love… this love is inconceivable, irrevocable, undeniable, unyielding, and immortal.
author: Kimberly Soto
